/>
IX.ii.1.A.3.c
.
Additional Information on A&A and Housebound Qualifications
For additional information on A&A and housebound qualifications, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, 2.C
, or administrative grants of A&A based on nursing home status, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, 1.B
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on Requirements for Aid and Attendance (A&A) and Housebound Status Under 38 CFR 3.351
citation: Part IX, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
